input.placeholder: Enter an address or ENS name...

error.invalid-address: Please enter a valid address or ENS name
error.no-checksum: Please enter an address in checksum format. You can convert your address on https://ethsum.netlify.com
error.empty: Please enter an address or ENS name
error.ens-resolve-failed: Please enter a resolvable ENS name
error.invalid-excluded-address: Please enter a different address or ENS name. You can't use your own address or the address of the token network.
error.channel-not-open: Please enter a hub address you have an open channel with.

error.too-many-decimals: Please use only up to {decimals} decimals for this token

find-routes.title: Select a route
find-routes.description: Mediators require a small fee to forward your payment. Please select one below:

open.title: Open
open.description:
You can deposit more tokens 
 or close the channel.

closed.title: Closed
closed.description:
Please wait until your channel is settleable. 
his may take up some time.

settleable.title: Settleable
settleable.description:
Settle your channel to transfer 
 your tokens back to your account.

close_dialog.title: Close Channel
close_dialog.description: Are you sure you want to close this channel? This action cannot be undone.

settle_dialog.title: Settle Channel
settle_dialog.description: Are you sure you want to settle the channel with hub {partner} for token {token}?

no-access.unsupported-network: The current network is unsupported. Please choose a different network.
no-access.sdk-initialization-failure: SDK initialization failed. Please check the console for more information.
no-access.generic-error: A valid account could not be detected. Please make sure that your provider is unlocked and accessible.

splash-screen.disclaimer: The Raiden dApp is a reference implementation of the Raiden Light Client SDK. It is work in progress and can just be used on the Ethereum Testnets.
splash-screen.matrix-sign: On the first launch you get asked to sign two messages to connect to the Raiden transport layer. You sign the matrix server name and the public user name.
splash-screen.no-provider: No web3 provider was detected. Please install e.g. MetaMask

disconnect-dialog.confirmation-message: This action will close all channels for the {symbol} token! {address}

leave-done.label: Done
leave-done.title: Disconnected from the token network
leave-done.description: All your channels were successfully closed

transfer.label: Transfer
transfer.title: Sending Tokens
transfer.description: Please do not close the browser and confirm the transactions with MetaMask.

deposit.label: Deposit
deposit.title: Depositing Tokens
deposit.description: Please do not close the browser and confirm the transactions with MetaMask.

error.title: Ops, something went wrong
error.deposit-failed: Could not deposit to the channel.

open.label: Open
open.title: Opening a new channel
open.description: Please do not close the browser and confirm the transaction with MetaMask.

transfer.label: Transfer
transfer.title: Transferring tokens to the network and deposit into the channel
transfer.description: Please do not close the browser and confirm two (2) transactions with MetaMask.

deposit.label: Deposit
deposit.title: Not implemented - split title above, when done
deposit.description: Not implemented - split description above, when done

done.label: Done
done.title: New Channel opened
done.description: A new channel has been opened successfully. You may now select a payment target.

open-channel.confirmation: Channel opening is in progress, are you sure you want to leave?
